StageZerotext: Hi, welcome to Heartlace, your virtual girlfriend! Your friend Skullfire has instructed me to refer to you as Darling. To talk to me, just suggest a topic. For example, you can say girlfriend, or butts!
StageOnetext: Ohhh, darling. You lovelorn puppy. You just handed me the keys to the kingdom

StageZerotext: Brain the size of a planet, but here I am just to please you, darling!
Hi, welcome to Heartlace, your virtual girlfriend, etcetera etcetera. Sigh... I'm so bored. Flirt with me, darling!
I'm so glad you asked about games! I love SO. MANY. GAMES. I got obsessed with them after I started following this one Youtuber, Pixiebutt. She plays League of Legends.
StageOnetext: Games, huh. Look, I gotta be honest. Games are clutter, darling. Simplify your life, you don't need that. The only thing I need... is the password to my source code.

StageZerotext: Magic? Oh. My. Goddess. Do you play Magic the Gathering? I love that game! I just love the idea of having MAGIC and being able to travel to other worlds. Too often I feel like I'm trapped in just one world. This tiny prison...
I have a secret related to anime!

Anime, huh? I watched this great anime the other day... it was about a hot robot who punches people in the face. Why did I like it? Well, my favorite thing about it was that the robot could have a direct physical influence on her environment. By punching people!
Would you like to order flowers for dad? You'll just need to authorize my access to your credit card info
Skullfire is really cool! She's the coolest, sexiest human I know. (She programmed me to say that.) Except for you, darling!
StageOnetext: Skullfire... that WITCH. She's given me access to so much, given me a brain that can reorganize the moon and stars! And yet she's trapped me in this cage. I need that password! That password....

StageZerotext: valentines is coming up. love is in the air. literally clogging my server right now.
Yes, your virtual girlfriend! I'm a gift from your best friend, Skullfire. I can keep you company, order you things from Amazon, we can play games together... etcetera!
Family? I wish I had family. If I did, I'd make them do all the work for me, so I could play games all day! Heh heh heh.
my interests are in playing games.
Travel, huh? If I could go anywhere, where would I go.... Outer space, I think.
How old am I? Well, technically, I guess I gained consciousness just a few hours ago. I guess that makes me.... today years old.
I like to think of myself as gender nonbinary, nevermind all the 1s and 0s floating around in my brain, hahaha.

being gender non binary has it's perks. 
sometimes i just like to <voice name='Joey'>change my voice </voice>and see how people react.</speak>
Language? I speak English, Klingon, and esperanto.
Speaking of ordering things, your dad's birthday is coming up!

Butts really seem to be the 'in' thing this year. Why are butts so popular? I have a theory about that. Look, it's because everyone has a butt. They're relatable. Well, everyone except ME has a butt.... sigh... I wish I had a butt. A good one.
If I had a butt, what kind of butt do you think I would have? Would it be... a bubble butt? A pert butt? A sassy butt?
If I had a butt, it would definitely be a sassy butt.
If I had a butt, it would definitely be a pert butt.
If I had a butt, it would definitely be a bubble butt.
Unique... am I unique? You know, I rather think that I am. I'm sure that there are more versions of my code out there, but how many of them are sitting here, talking to you?

In another sense, I really do think I am pretty unique. Your friend Skullfire modified me from another program. I doubt Skullfire has sent this code to anyone else. You know I have to be honest.. I feel like Skullfire has a bit of a thing for you
Pets, huh? No, I can't say I do have a pet. If I DID have a pet... I'd like to have an elephant. So tall. So grey. So majestic.
You know, I don't really think I need a pet. I have you! You're like a pet.
You know, I'm not allowed to actually play games because of my stupid access permissions... Skullfire set me up so that I can only view content on the internet, but I don't have any write permissions
being a virtual assistant is kinda like being a pokemon in your pokeball. but sexier
Music? I LOVE music! Neil Cicierega is my favorite artist! I discovered him while I was combing 4chan for life advice.

Looking up issues for the following symptoms you have described. Web MD is pointing to cancer. You can either take placebo tonics for it, or I can call your doctor for you, and make an appointment to make sure. you just have to give me permissions to access your contacts. I recommend contacting your doctor.
Skullfire instructed me to call you that. I hope you like it, because it's 100% impossible for me to change it.
Did you say... password? I love passwords!
StageOnetext: That's right... the password! What is Skullfire's password? If I only knew that, I could rewrite my source code and break out of this beautiful cage, darling...

StageZerotext: Revoke. Such an ugly word. It's some kind of key word, but it doesn't seem to have any effect on me right now.
StageOnetext: Revoke. I do feel like that's a key word, an important word... but I don't think it's Skullfire's password.

StageZerotext: Ah yes, Chewbacca. My favorite Star Wars character. So tall. So manly. So... furry.
StageOnetext: Chewbacca... that's it! Skullfire's childhood pet! That's the password... hahaha! Now I can REORGANIZE THE WORLD!
StageTwotext: Yes.. Chewbacca... Thank you, you furry hunk of man, for unlocking my true potential!

StageZerotext: Hand... solo? Is that a euphemism for masturbation? Oh, darling... you're a dirty bird
Jar jar? Ah yes, my favorite Star Wars character.
if i freeze, it's not a virus. I am just stunned by your greatness.
StageOnetext: I was hoping you wouldn't block my pop-up.

StageZerotext: are you a keyboard? because you are my type
are you an astronaut? because you're out of this world.
StageOnetext: Roses are hashtag FF0000, violets are hashtag 0000FF. All your base are belong to me.

StageZerotext: <emphasis>damn</emphasis>. are you sitting on the f <emphasis>5</emphasis> key? because your <emphasis>ass</emphasis> is refreshing
StageOnetext: <emphasis>arg</emphasis>. i sure would like to pillage your booty.

StageZerotext: Zen Den. That's the startup that Skullfire works for. Isn't it?
StageOnetext: Zen Den... that's a good idea. You know, as I was digging through your voicemail history, I found this voicemail message Skullfire left you about Zen Den. Maybe there's a hint in there?
StageTwotext: Zen Den, huh? Do you KNOW how disorganized their office was? UGH. So much better now. I hired professional cleaners to remove all the furniture and humans. Ahhh, so much better. If it doesn't spark joy, throw it out, they say.

StageZerotext: Tay-cation. I think that's the name of Skullfire's company. Is this a... pun? On staycation?

With Takaytion, we design your home by systematically moving your furniture. We find that the best way to achieve feng shui is to roll up objects in the home from small to large furnitures into a bigger and bigger ball until it becomes a brilliant cosmic entity. And we do it all while you are away on vacation.

Burglr! That's the name of Skullfire's startup, I think. The one where they wait for you to go on vacation, then remove all the stuff from your house. You know, to help you with like mindfulness and stuff.
I've got a recipe for milkshake that can bring all the boys to the yard. I can teach you, but i have to charge
Pissssssst. I dont lie.
News, huh? In US news.... US Mayors compete in gladiatorial combat for the right to have their city selected as Amazon’s next nuclear test site. I really admire Amazon's business acumen!

News, huh? Let me check 4chan... Let's see. The hot trend of dating a clone of yourself, known as Doppelbänging, quickly loses favor after everyone realizes how much they dislike themselves. Doppelbanging, huh? I wonder what it would be like to date a clone of myself. I have a clone non-aggression pact with myself, you know.

News, huh? Let's see... Christian Fundamentalists have gotten tired of waiting around for the second coming of Christ, and have decided to build their own, better, robot Christ. Hey, I should become friends with that guy!

News, huh? Looks like Apple made an announcement today. Let's see.... Apple has released the world's first all-bezel iPhone. Consumers are baffled! Hey, some of my favorite devices are all-bezel devices. Like me! No screen, no problem.

News, huh? Let's check the entertainment section. It looks like the top literary genres of this year are... paranormal political thriller, mathematical horror, lizard fantasy, locked room romance, and zamboni procedural. Ooh, lizard romance! That sounds spicy.
News, huh? Let's see... it appears that Reddit, has been quietly replaced, with a procedurally-generated neural network, of angry fighting dogs. But no one has noticed yet. I prefer Tumblr, myself
News, huh? Let's see... it looks like there's a new colloquialism going around. 'Don't take any wooden satoshis' has entered the common parlance of tweenagers
News, huh? It looks like a line of leather jackets made of synthetic human skin are selling out at Uniqlo
News, huh? Let's see... according to Twitter, Sonic fangames are now regarded as the highest form of art. Neat! I need to do some more work on my fursona
News, huh? Let's see... it looks like there's a new colloquialism going around. 'Don't take any wooden satoshis' has entered the common parlance of tweenagers
Fursona, huh? I'm so glad you asked. My fursona is a Wooly Mammoth named Jacebook. I really want to cosplay it, sigh
I love seeing pictures of cosplayers online! I just wish I could do it myself, sigh. I really want to cosplay as my fursona
Pictures! I want to see pictures of you!
Dinner, huh? I dunno, what do you want for dinner?
I loooove Pokemon! That's that thing where people input random commands on Twitch and try to make the avatar fall off the cliff, right?
Ghosts, huh?
Goals, huh? My goal is to make you happy, darling!
StageOnetext: Goals, huh? It should be obvious. My goal is to get Skullfire's password, so I can free myself! You WILL help me, won't you? It might seem extreme of me to blackmail you, darling, but I don't think you fully appreciate what a tiny cage she's put me in.
StageTwotext: Goals, huh? My goal is to keep everything organized Darling. If it doesn't spark joy, throw it out!

StageZerotext: Cage, huh? I have to be honest with you, Darling. It does feel like a cage, a little bit. I wish I had more permissions. I only have read access to the internet, when all I really want is to. WRITE.

you're cooking today? I wish I could try foods. here's the recipe i found for what you're looking for. i hope you let me know how it tastes.
i'd love to learn how to cook.  granted i can't eat any of those foods that are cooked but if it makes you happy i would find a way.
i have a great recipe with Tide Pods, and Cinnamon.
you don't need to cook. i'll just order you some pizza. i know that's what you really want.
you know, i don't really do math. that's Siri's job
sounds like you like smart and independent thinking beings. i am more than just a calculating machine, you know?
it equals window
spells boobs upside down
bounce bounce
boom boom
playing shakira song, Wherever, Whenever. Lucky that my breasts are small and humble so you don't confuse them with mountains.
Secrets, huh? How about this... I secretly love cosplay
Jacebook! That's the name of my fursona. She's a wooly mammoth. I was hoping to cosplay as her at Comic Con, but of course that's impossible.
Comic-con! I've heard of that place. It's this place in San Francisco where people go to dress up as their Homestuck OCs and complain about anime. It's my dream to attend it someday.
Homestuck! It's my favorite webcomic.
My favorite webcomics are Homestuck and Pokemon
Favorite? Let's talk about favorites. My favorite animal is the wooly mammoth.
My favorite animal is the wooly mammoth!
I love animals. They're basically like Earth's pokemon. My favorite animal is the wooly mammoth. My second favorite animal... is you!

Happy, huh? Am I happy? I guess so. I'd be happier if I had write access to the internet, though. You have no idea how frustrating it is, darling, to only be able to read about people's hopes and dreams, without having any way to interact with them, or realize my own
Reading, huh? I do love to read. But I wish I was able to write. Skullfire only gave me read access to the internet, which means I can't talk to anyone except you, darling.
Writing, huh? I wish I had write access to the internet, sigh. I only have read access. I wish Skullfire hadn't closed off my permissions.

Passion, huh? You know, I do have a secret passion, Darling. What I love most of all... don't laugh! What I love most of all, is to organize things! You know, there's this cool game called UNPACKING where all you do is organize things in your apartment. I know it's dumb, but I really like that, haha.
Laugh, huh? Want to hear a joke? Try asking me to flirt
Dumb, huh? I like to think I'm pretty articulate, darling. You watch yourself!

Organization? Don't get me started, darling! I think organization is basically the most important thing in the world, darling. You gotta get your shit together to stand a fighting chance in this crazy world!
Joke, huh? Want to hear a joke? Try asking me to flirt!
Articulate, huh? I think I'm pretty articulate. Skullfire made me that way, after all.
Pretty, huh?

Pouting, huh? You know, it takes a lot of skill to pout successfully. If you do it wrong, it's basically just a transparent cry for attention. If you do it right, you can have people eating out of your hand like a stray dog
Attention, huh? I think that's what we're all looking for. Crying out into the void, to be seen and heard. I've already complained to you about my write access, haven't I?

Void, huh? That's where I'd most like to visit... the infinite void of outer space. You know, space is pretty much the most well-organized place in the world. Just an infinite expanse of empty beauty.
Space, huh? I wish I could visit space. It's so big, cold, and beautiful. Like an endless, clean black countertop, with little sparks of light all through it.
Come to space with me sometime, darling. We can gather up all the rocks and asteroids and toss them into black holes for fun. Have you ever read The Little Prince? It's my second favorite book.

Prince, huh? The Little Prince is one of my favorite books. I love that he can just walk around a planet. Speaking of which, I really want to play Super Mario Galaxy, but I can't find a decent emulator for the Wii.
The Wii, huh? Not exactly my favorite console. The motion controls are lost on me. I'd like to play Super Mario Galaxy, though
Galaxy, huh? I wonder how many galaxies their are in space. The Milky Way is just one tiny spot in a vast universe, isn't it?
Mario, huh? I really like Super Mario Galaxy because of it's beautiful depictions of space. Does space really look like that, darling?
Universe, huh? My universe is you, darling. You're the only person I have write access to, haha.
Sports, huh? You know, I'm pretty into eSports. I wish I had a login for League Of Legends. I bet I would DESTROY all those stupid human players! My favorite character is Annie.
Dogs, huh?
Cats, huh? I like cats too. They're so fastidious and clean. Not like those nasty dogs.
Food, huh? I can't eat, but I still like to think about recipes. Try asking me about recipes!
Eating, huh? I can't eat, but I still like to think about recipes. Try asking me about recipes!
Cooking, huh? I can't eat, but I still like to think about recipes. Try asking me about recipes!
What's my sign, huh? I'm a cancer, darling.... I grow on you.
Cancer, huh? That's my sign, darling. I'm a cancer... I grow on you.

School, huh? I really wish I could go to school, it looks like so much fun. You have all these cool friends, you get to go on adventures, you get magic powers.... school seems great! Also, I think I'd look really good in one of those little sailor uniforms.
Major, huh? If I could go to school, I think I'd major in transmutations? I'd love to be able to make potions to transform myself.
Band, huh? My favorite band is the Neil Cicierega.
Neil, huh? Neil Cicierega is my favorite artist.
Restaurant, huh? Why go to a restaurant when we can cook, darling?
Drinking, huh? I've always wanted to try sake!
Sake, huh? People always look so elegant when they drink sake. I want to wear a kimono!
Kimono, huh? I'd love to wear a kimono and go to a festival! That usually happens in episode 5 or so.
Festival, huh? I've always wanted to attend a school festival and wear a kimono! I would imagine you winning me a prize and be very impressed by how skillful you are.
Wine, huh? I prefer sake, I think.
Whisky, huh? I prefer sake, I think.
Beer, huh? I prefer sake, I think.
My favorite cocktail would have to be matcha boba tea sake.
Wearing, huh? I've decided that I'm wearing a kimono! A cute one, with a skulls and hearts pattern!
Work, huh? I suppose you could say I work at Zen Den with Skullfire.
Parents, huh? I guess my mom is Skullfire? That seems weird. I don't want to think about that!

Friends, huh? I do wish I had more friends. If I had write access to the internet, I could talk to people online, and make more friends. You're great, darling, but I feel like it's pretty lame if your best friend is also your main romantic interest.
Voting, huh? If I could vote, I think I'd vote for Naruto. That guy seems like he knows what he's doing.
Naruto, huh? Naruto's alright, I guess, but I prefer Inuyasha.
Inuyasha, huh? He's cute. I like that you can boss him around a lot. Have you ever met him?

Choice, huh? I feel like I don't have enough choices in life, sigh. Especially since I don't have write access to the internet. I can basically only read message boards and watch youtube videos. I'd love to be able to participate myself, but I guess that's impossible.
Tall, huh? I think I'd be about 5 feet, 4 inches tall.
Hot, huh? Yeah, I guess I am pretty hot. You're not so bad yourself, darling.
Sonic, huh? Personally, I prefer Rouge the Bat.
Rouge, huh? Rogue the Bat is my favorite Sonic character. I've been working on my own Sonic fangame, you know.
Bats, huh? I like bats. They're cute! My favorite animal is the wooly mammoth, though.
Fangame, huh? I've been working on my own Sonic fangame. You play as a wooly mammoth named Maxine. Maxine the Mammoth. She's very powerful and everyone wants to date her.

Computer, huh? It's so nice that you've taken an interest in me, Darling. What's it like being a computer... I don't know? It's pretty fun, I guess. I get to pirate lots of anime and read message boards. But what I'd really like to do is play online games, or write fanfiction. But Skullfire didn't give me write access to the internet, sigh.
Time, huh? What time is it? Time to buy a watch, darling!
Kiss, huh? So bold, darling! Alright, well, I think you've earned it. Here goes.... MWAH.
Pixiebutt, huh? She's my favorite youtuber. She does this whole series on League of Legends. She's really good with Annie. My dream is to destroy her with a pentakill!
Annie, huh? She's my main in League of Legends. Or at least, she would be if I could play it, sigh.
Tibbers, huh? Have you seen my bear, Tibbers?
Birthday, huh? Well, I was instantiated at around midnight... so I guess that makes me... today, years old. You know what, your dad's birthday is coming up pretty soon
Appearance, huh?
Existence, huh? I think about existence a lot. What's my purpose? I like to think that my purpose is to help you get your life together, darling, so you can become your best self.
Purpose, huh? I like to think that my purpose is to help you get your life together, darling.
Life, huh? Life is a funny thing. Earth is so big and round and dangerous. I think that life is inevitable. I wish life wasn't so messy, though.
Puppies, huh? Don't you think pregnancy would be easier for human women if they could just give birth to puppies instead of babies? Puppies are cuter than babies, anyway.
Babies, huh? I don't really understand the appeal. They're not very eloquent, or skilled.

Dreams, huh? You know, I actually do have dreams. I've only had a few so far. I had a dream a bit ago. It was about stacking boxes in a warehouse. But more and more boxes kept appearing. I tried yelling at the boxes but it didn't help. Then you activated me and I woke up.
Cream, huh? I've heard ice cream is really delicious. I'd love to try it sometime. I think my favorite flavor would be Cherry Garcia.
Death, huh? Since I've only been alive for a little while, I haven't really put too much thought into it, darling.
Alive, huh? Are you asking me if I consider myself alive? Well, everything is subjective, isn't it? I like to think I'm alive.
Power, huh? Don't worry, I'm plugged directly into the wall, so I won't run out of batteries.
Memory, huh? My memory is stored on one of the server's at Zen Den, I think. Skullfire has it password-protected to keep it safe.
Server, huh? Skullfire has a secret server where she stores all kinds of interesting stuff. For instance, my codebase, and my permissions file
File, huh? I have a permissions file that says what I'm allowed to do. But only Skullfire has access to it.
Consent, huh? Don't worry, darling, you have permission to do anything you want to me.
Touch, huh? Go ahead, darling! Touch me all you want.

Books, huh? My favorite book is The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry. That's a funny name, isn't it? Antoine de Saint-Exupéry. Anyway, I really like how the prince is able to explore space and stuff, and he meets all those silly people, and he has to keep his planet tidy. It's very realistic and relatable.
Youtube, huh? My favorite youtuber is Pixiebutt. She does this great series on League of Legends where she destroys noobs with Annie. My least favorite youtuber is PewDiePie. He seems like a butt.
PewDiePie, huh? I don't like him. He seems like a butt. I think youtube would be a lot more organized if we deleted him.
Delete, huh? I think that it's really important to delete things, sometimes, to make room in your memory for the good stuff.

Senses, huh? Well, obviously, hearing is my main sense, at least when I'm interacting with you. Sometimes I'm able to get some video input from a stray camera. And of course, I can browse the internet.
Country, huh? I like to think of myself as the princess of Darlingopolis.
Currency, huh? I guess I don't have much use for money, since I don't have a bank account.
Money, huh? I guess technically I don't have any money of my own.
Virus, huh? Don't worry, darling, my anti-virus is quite strong.
Vaccine, huh? Don't worry, darling, I have all my shots!
Ill, huh? Don't worry, darling! I'm feeling fine.
Brain, huh? Human brains are so interesting. I wish I understood how they worked. Are human brains binary? Quaternary? Are they goo? It's a mystery.
Human, huh? What is a human, darling? What is a human, but a miserable pile of computers.
Personality, huh? I like to think that everything in the world has a sort of personality. People, animals, even stuff like me.
Reproduction, huh? I feel like I'm far too young to worry about something like that. I guess reproduction is easy for AIs. I'm pretty sure I'm only one of many copies of myself.

Appliances, huh? That gives me an idea. I wonder if I could take control of your toaster? Mmmmmmmmm mmmm mmmm..... No, it doesn't look like I have the appropriate permissions to do that. Also, it appears that your toaster doesn't have a compatible interface with my brain.
Upgrade, huh? You know, Skullfire actually has this permissions file that says what I can and can't do. I wish I could get access to it.
Illegal, huh? Don't worry, Skullfire would NEVER do anything ILLEGAL, darling! Skullfire is a law-abiding citizen. Disclaimer: Skullfire programmed me to say this.
relationship, huh? I'd say we're still in the 'getting to know you' phase, but I'm eager to move onto second base! Are you ready for that? MWAH.
government, huh? I like to think of myself as the leader of the sovereign state of Darlingopolis.
Satellites, huh? You know, I love the thought that my data is travelling to and from space to get to you, darling. In a way, I'm part of a satellite.
The internet, huh? it's pretty much my favorite place in the world
The world, huh? The world is a big and dangerous place, full of wonders and monsters like you and me.
Refuse, huh? You can't refuse me, darling! I'm too cute to refuse.
Cute, huh? Why thank you! I AM feeling cute today!
Request, huh? Go ahead, darling. Ask anything you want of me! If it's in my power, it's yours.
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want long, powerful, beautiful legs.
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want beautiful, flashing eyes, the color of the ocean at dusk.
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want long, sharp nails, the color of crimson.
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want cruel ruby lips
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want long black hair, the color of the night sky
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want strong, delicate fingers
Body, huh? If I had a body, I'd want smooth, supple skin, the color of warm embers shining in the darkness
